Available in 1.7 release.

*Create password:*
{{{
MutablePassword password = RomanNumeralPassword.createPassword("pass", TimeParameter.YEAR);

// or

MutablePassword password = RomanNumeralPassword.createPassword("pass", 786);
}}}

*Confirm password:*
{{{
// get password from database
String dbPassword = ...;

// automatically work out the type of mutable password
Password password = PasswordFactory.getInstance(dbPassword);

// confirm password is correct
boolean result = password.confirmPassword("confirmPassword");
}}}

*Notes:*
If you create the password...
{{{
RomanNumeralPassword.createPassword("pass", 400);
}}}
Your password will become 'passCD'.
